properties.name: spring.sleuth.web.trace.naming.convert-to-underscores.enabled
properties.description: Enables the conversation from camel case method names to underscore delimited method names.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.web.trace.naming.mvc-method-names-as-span-names.enabled
properties.description: Enables MVC web handler method name as trace span name.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.hibernate.inject-tracing-ids-in-queries.enabled
properties.description: Enables adding trace and span ids to hibernate queries.
